about2.note: Strive to build things that make a difference!

project.intro3: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
project.project1: Social Media Client meant for developers to share code snippets and collaborate on snippets with a text editor in real time, built with React.js, Node.js, socket.io and MongoDB. Created in partnership with my bootcamp colleague and friend, Santiago Moncada.
project.project2: Social Media Server meant for developers to share code snippets and collaborate on snippets with a text editor in real time, built with React.js, Node.js, socket.io and MongoDB. Created in partnership with my bootcamp colleague and friend, Santiago Moncada.
project.project3: Almacen BPO is a stock management application developed for Secuoya Content Group's BPO division. Built on Laravel and MySQL, this app provides efficient inventory control and optimization, enhancing productivity for the organization.
project.project4: Guided tour visit application made with React.js and WordPress for the Mobility City Museum in Zaragoza, Spain.
project.project_warning2: Please note that the project's repository is not publicly available due to its proprietary nature.
